Languages: Chalcian; Dwarven; Saxa; Vendahl; Vindari
Skill Notes:

Habit: -1 Charisma
Outsider: -2 Charisma (other races)
Size: 0 Deity: The Unknowable One
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 8; Skill: 6
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (5 points): Arcane Background (Elementalism); Elementalism (Eir); Enhanced Maintenance; Instinctive Dispel; Spell Finesse (Altered Range) Hindrances: Habit; Outsider; Tongue-Tied+ Saxa Human Abilities: Diverse
Feature Notes: Habit: Has an irritating but harmless compulsion
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 2 Toughness: 9 (3) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Plate Corselet Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Axe (d4+d4); Halberd (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0)

Axe Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d4
Halberd Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d4
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers: Dispel: (3 PP) R10" Ends targeted power (Casting suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; opposed arcane skill neg)
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Elementalism): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Enhanced Maintenance: May maintain a spell while asleep
Instinctive Dispel: May attempt a free Dispel of a spell that effects self 1/rd
Spell Finesse (Altered Range): Increases range of chosen touch spell to 10" or ranged spell to 12"
